metadata.description: Scaffolds ERC-8004 and 8004 AI agents (EVM and Solana) with A2A, MCP, and x402 using create-8004-agent. Supports OpenAI or Anthropic Claude. Use when creating trustless AI agents for Base Sepolia, Ethereum Sepolia, Polygon Amoy, Monad, or Solana Devnet.

plugins.name: erc8004-agent-creator
plugins.description: Scaffolds ERC-8004 and 8004 AI agents with A2A, MCP, and x402 using create-8004-agent. Use when the user wants to create an 8004/ERC-8004 agent, choose chain (e.g. Base Sepolia), features (A2A, MCP, x402), and optionally LLM provider (OpenAI or Anthropic/Claude). Includes Python patch script to switch generated project to Claude.
